biotools.summary: Web based portal for exploring and analyzing comprehensive organism-specific cross-platform expression compendia of bacterial organisms. The compendia were carefully constructed by collecting, homogenizing and formally annotating publicly available microarray and RNA-seq experiments from Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO), and ArrayExpress.

bioschemas.name: COLOMBOS
